1.title: Conquest of Canaan
1.keyEvent: Israelites begin to drive out Canaanite inhabitants

2.title: Angel's Rebuke
2.keyEvent: Angel rebukes Israel for disobedience after Joshua's death

3.title: First Judges Raised
3.keyEvent: God raises judges to deliver Israel from enemies

4.title: Deborah and Barak
4.keyEvent: Deborah leads Israel to victory over Canaanites

5.title: Song of Deborah
5.keyEvent: Deborah and Barak sing a victory song

6.title: Call of Gideon
6.keyEvent: Gideon is called to deliver Israel from Midianites

8.title: Gideon's Pursuit
8.keyEvent: Gideon pursues and defeats remaining Midianites

9.title: Abimelech's Reign
9.keyEvent: Abimelech becomes king and kills his brothers

10.title: Israel's Apostasy
10.keyEvent: Israel serves Baalim; God raises judges again

11.title: Jephthah's Vow
11.keyEvent: Jephthah leads Israel and makes a tragic vow

13.title: Birth of Samson
13.keyEvent: Angel announces Samson's birth to his mother

14.title: Samson's Marriage
14.keyEvent: Samson marries a Philistine woman; riddle incident

15.title: Samson's Revenge
15.keyEvent: Samson avenges himself against the Philistines

16.title: Samson's Downfall
16.keyEvent: Samson is captured, blinded, and destroys Philistine temple

17.title: Micah's Idols
17.keyEvent: Micah sets up idols and hires a Levite priest

18.title: Danites Steal Idols
18.keyEvent: Danites steal Micah's idols and priest

19.title: Levite's Concubine
19.keyEvent: Levite's concubine abused and killed in Gibeah

20.title: Civil War
20.keyEvent: Israelites wage war against tribe of Benjamin

21.title: Restoration of Benjamin
21.keyEvent: Israelites provide wives for surviving Benjamites
